text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Wed 07 April, 2,763 new cases and 45 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK

31,707,594 people have now received the first dose of a #vaccine and 5,683,509 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/rQOZx2Q8Wg
